column4: i have a video-dvd and in nautilus it is shown as empty. but if i start nautilus with root-rights the files & folders of the dvd are shown correctly. other dvds are shown correctly in nautilus with user-rights. so what's the problem with this one dvd?
maybe someone used Rock Ridge extensions and the files have weird permissions
but if it's a video dvd i do not see how could that happen...
afaik the dvd was burned with windows..
